exams.title: International Travellers' Club Ad
exams.incomingEmail:
INTERTRAVEL
The International Travellers' Club

Do you ever travel abroad? Would you like to meet more people and make more friends when you are in another country?

If so, join INTERTRAVEL! We have contacts in over 100 European cities.

Send us your personal details and you will receive more information about our services and about how to become a member.

Write today to:
intertravel@leeds.co.uk
writingPoints: Ask for more details (e. g. cost, registration, etc.)
Give some information about yourself
Mention the reason for your enquiry
Say why you would like to join Intertravel

exams.title: Summer Language Course Ad
exams.incomingEmail:
OXFORD SUMMER SCHOOL

Do you want to improve your English this summer? Come to our language school in the heart of Oxford!

We offer 2-week and 4-week intensive courses for adults at all levels. Small groups, experienced teachers, and a great social programme included.

Accommodation is available in the student residence or with host families.

Write to us for more details and prices:
info@oxford-summer-school.com
writingPoints: Mention the reason for your enquiry
Give some information about yourself (age, current English level)
Ask about the cost of the course and accommodation
Ask for more details about the social programme

exams.title: Tennis Club Advertisement
exams.incomingEmail:
THE RACKET CLUB

Are you looking for a fun way to keep fit? Join our new tennis and badminton club in the city centre!

We welcome players of all ages and levels, from absolute beginners to advanced players. We offer group lessons, weekend tournaments, and a comfortable clubhouse.

Special discount for students and families this month!

For more details, contact us at:
membership@racket-club.net
writingPoints: Mention the reason for your enquiry
Give some information about yourself (age, sports experience)
Ask about the cost of membership and lessons
Ask if you need to bring your own equipment

exams.title: Holiday Cottage Advertisement
exams.incomingEmail:
SEASIDE HOLIDAYS

Are you planning your next holiday? Rent our lovely stone cottage in Cornwall.

Located just 5 minutes from the beach, it is the perfect place to relax. The cottage sleeps up to 6 people and has a fully equipped kitchen and a large garden.

Available from May to September.

For booking and availability, email Mrs. Jones at:
cottage-holidays@webmail.com
writingPoints: Mention the reason for your enquiry
Say when you want to visit and how many people are coming
Ask about the price per week
Ask if pets are allowed in the cottage

exams.title: Music Festival Volunteer Ad
exams.incomingEmail:
SUMMER SOUND FESTIVAL

Do you love music? Do you want to be part of the biggest event of the summer?

We are looking for energetic volunteers to help us at this year's festival in July.

Jobs include helping at the entrance, selling programmes, and assisting the bands. In return, you get a free pass to all concerts and free camping!

If you are interested, please write to:
volunteers@summersound.com
writingPoints: Mention the reason for your enquiry
Give some information about yourself (age, interests)
Say why you would like to be a volunteer
Ask about the exact dates and working hours

exams.title: Cooking Class Advertisement
exams.incomingEmail:
ITALIAN COOKING SCHOOL

Do you love Italian food? Do you want to learn how to make perfect pasta and pizza?

Join our weekend cooking workshops! Our expert chefs will teach you traditional recipes in a fun and relaxed atmosphere.

Courses take place every Saturday and Sunday. All ingredients are provided.

For more information and to book a place, please email:
info@cooking-school.net
writingPoints: Mention the reason for your enquiry
Give some information about your cooking experience
Ask about the price of the workshop
Ask about the exact start and finish times

exams.title: Summer Internship Advertisement
exams.incomingEmail:
GLOBAL MARKETING GROUP

Are you a student? Do you want to gain work experience in an international environment?

We are looking for motivated interns for our London office this summer (July - August).

You will help our team with social media projects and organize events. Excellent English skills are required.

Send your application to Ms. Baker at:
jobs@global-marketing.com
writingPoints: Mention the reason for your enquiry
Give some information about yourself (studies, languages)
Say why you are interested in this internship
Ask about the working hours and if the internship is paid

exams.title: Visit from a Friend
exams.incomingEmail:
Subject: Visiting you!

Hi!

I have some great news. I am finally coming to your city next month for a few days! I have a holiday from work and I'd love to see you.

Are you around in the second week of May? I really want to meet up.

Also, I haven't booked a hotel yet. Do you know a good, cheap place to stay near the centre?

Let me know! I can't wait to see you.

Best wishes,
Alex
writingPoints: Say how you feel about the visit
Say if you are free in the second week of May
Recommend a place to stay (or offer accommodation)
Suggest an activity you can do together

exams.title: Birthday Party Invitation
exams.incomingEmail:
Subject: My Birthday Party!

Hello!

I hope you are doing well. 

I'm writing because I'm celebrating my birthday next Saturday night. I'm having a big party at my house with food, drinks, and music. It would be wonderful if you could come!

Also, I'm thinking of preparing some vegetarian food. Do you know any good recipes?

Please let me know if you can make it.

Love,
Julia
writingPoints: Thank Julia for the invitation
Explain why you cannot come to the party (e.g., family event, travel)
Suggest a recipe or food idea for the party
Suggest meeting another time to give her a present

exams.title: News about a New Job
exams.incomingEmail:
Subject: Big News!

Hi!

I have some exciting news to tell you. I finally got a new job in Manchester! I am going to move there next month.

I am very happy, but I am also a bit nervous because I don't know anyone there. I know you moved to a new city last year. How did you make new friends?

Also, I need to find an apartment. Do you think it is better to live alone or share a flat with other people?

Write back soon!

Best wishes,
Daniel
writingPoints: Congratulate Daniel on his new job
Give him advice on how to meet new people
Give your opinion about living alone or sharing a flat
Ask him when he starts working

exams.title: Meeting Request from Boss
exams.incomingEmail:
Subject: Project Meeting

Dear Staff,

I would like to have a brief meeting with you next Tuesday at 9:00 am to discuss the plans for our new project.

Please let me know if you are available at this time.

Also, I have not received the monthly sales report from you yet. Have you finished it? I need it before the meeting.

Best regards,

Mrs. Miller
Project Manager
writingPoints: Thank Mrs. Miller for her email
Explain why you cannot come to the meeting on Tuesday at 9:00 am (e.g., doctor's appointment, client visit)
Suggest a different time or day for the meeting
Say when you will send the monthly report

exams.title: Hotel Feedback Request
exams.incomingEmail:
Subject: Your recent stay at The Riverside Hotel

Dear Guest,

Thank you for choosing The Riverside Hotel for your recent visit to the city.

We hope you had a comfortable stay. We are always trying to improve our service, so we would like to know your opinion.

Were you happy with your room and the facilities? Did you try our restaurant?

Please let us know if there is anything we can do better next time.

Best regards,

David Evans
Hotel Manager
writingPoints: Thank Mr. Evans for the email
Say what you liked about the hotel (e.g., location, staff)
Mention a problem you had (e.g., the room was noisy, breakfast was cold)
Give a suggestion for improvement
